name: Chipotle Grilled Shrimp Tacos

ingredients.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix or Guacamole Dip Mix
Chipotle Aioli Mix or Louisiana Seasoning

preparation: In a bowl combine first three ingredients together. Cover and chill until ready to use.
In a large bowl, combine shrimps, olive oil, and aioli mix and toss to coat. Let shrimp marinate while grill is heating.
Thread the shrimp on to 12” Metal Skewers. Grill 2–3 minutes per side or until shrimp are cooked through.
Assemble tacos by placing coleslaw and warm shrimp in each tortilla and top with yogurt mixture and sprouts.
tips: Try warming tortillas on the grill before building your tacos.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup mixed fresh veggies. Try cucumber and cherry tomatoes!

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Chipotle Aioli Mix
summary: Medium-spicy Southwestern flavor with noteworthy chipotle chili and smoked paprika. A crowd-pleasing condiment for your burgers, fries, fish tacos, burritos and anything else that needs a little extra kick.

products.name: Louisiana Seasoning (1011503)
summary: A Cajun-inspired seasoning that brings the flavour with a medium-spice level.
